attributes.action: have David Tennant dressed in the role of 'The Doctor' to light the Olympic flame in 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What could be more British than having 'The Doctor' lighting the Olympic cauldron as in the TV episode.
The TV series is a landmark of British TV with the iconic blue phonebox. Who around the world wouldn't recognise the famous blue police box that would of long ago passed into history without Doctor Who. And who hasn't at least heard of the Doctor?
Doctor Who must be one of the most well known British TV series in the world and it would be a great shame not to include him in the opening Olympic Celebrations as part of our modern cultural heritage.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the London Olympic Games Organising Committee.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
